Text.Page:
Our scouts' hard work just paid off. We think we've located where the pylons are coming from. Prefect Thenuvia needs this information as soon as possible.

Naturally, there's only one soldier I'd entrust it to—you!

Kaia preserve Ghabar and all the vanguards! This is great news!

If we can keep these pylons from reaching the battlefield, Thulsa will have to commit his forces—and then we can tear them apart! Hah!
